sentence.Network_en: A rather neat option allows you to design your own fiendish puzzle.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要干净利落地做一个选择，你就能自己设计出难以解开的谜题。

sentence.Network_en: This was a fiendish act of wickedness.

PerfectNetExp.abs: fiend 魔鬼fiendish 恶魔似的fiendishly 恶魔似地
adj.极凶恶的  〔英〕 adj.极凶恶的 ( inhumanly wicked or cruel)  〔例〕 a fiendish despot ( 残暴的霸王) [编辑] Webster Collegiate adjective.
put fiendish language translation adult language category , involving the basic operating chain .把魔王的语言翻译成人类的语言，涉及链表等基本操作。
rap and heavy metal music is freely available though more fiendish musical terroriser might even choose experimental jazz or Maltese folk music .敲击或者重金属音乐可以随意获得，虽然更利害的音乐恐吓者可能甚至选择试验爵士乐或者马耳他民乐。

list.abs: this fiendish fighter may look cute , but its name says it all-Tasmanian Devil .这个邪恶的斗士可能看上去可爱，但它的名字已经表明了一切-塔斯马尼亚的恶魔。
put fiendish language translation adult language category , involving the basic operating chain .把魔王的语言翻译成人类的语言，涉及链表等基本操作。
A fiendish blizzard ; a fiendish problem ., 极大的暴风雪 ; 极大的难题.

of course , Zhu Bajie Finally protection tsang experience became the Buddha , cow fiendish also found guilty of the crimes back into the world forever. the enemy can no longer than two .当然，猪八戒最后因保护唐僧取经成了菩萨，牛魔王也因犯了天罪背永远打入人间，两个仇人无法再相比了。

entry.tran: (计划、行动、装置等)巧妙的，富有想象力的
entry.def: A fiendish plan, action, or device is very clever or imaginative.

entry.tran: 极其困难的;极具挑战性的
entry.def: A fiendish problem or task is very difficult and challenging.

example.ex: A rather neat option allows you to design your own fiendish puzzle.
example.tran: 只要干净利落地做一个选择，你就能自己设计出难以解开的谜题。
这些问题极度困难之处

entry.tran: 以残忍为乐的;恶魔般的
entry.def: A fiendish person enjoys being cruel.

example.ex: This was a fiendish act of wickedness.

means.word_mean: 1. extremely evil or cruel; expressive of cruelty or befitting hell;

sentences.sentence: "something demonic in him--something that could be cruel"
"diabolical sorcerers under the influence of devils"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"像……一样,有……的",通常放在具体的名词后; 2. 表动词,"造成……,成……"
